timeline.message:
Rename digitalTwinsModelData uploadTime to uploadedOn

As per Azure SDK feedback

timeline.bodyText: Would be better to match the property name to uploadedOn as well instead of uploadTime.
timeline.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: This code is mostly copied from a generated type, and the generated type uses uploadTime. In order to keep the manual edits after copying minimal, I'd rather not
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
